urls.title: Save On A Trip Just For You
urls.description: Book By: 11:59 PM EDT on November 2, 2022 Relax and unwind on vacation with fares from $44* one way. Saver$ Club members get additional savings with fares from $34* one way. Not a Saver$ Club member? Join the club to get these savings today! Get all current deals and offers directly in your email inbox. Sign up now! Get points for every dollar spent on fares and À La Smarte options. Become a Free Spirit ® member today and start earning now. * All fares must be booked on spirit.com by 11:59 PM EDT on

data.text: You deserve a vacation. Book now with fares from $44* one way. Book by 11/2 at 11:59 PM*: https://t.co/AQPTRqgjDf https://t.co/oXQld8n13c
